name: Scythe of Vyse
description: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Applies a hex on the unit-targeted enemy upon cast and turns it into a harmless critter.
notes: Applies a hex upon cast that applies the following effects on the affected enemy unit:
Sets its base movement speed to 140. All movement speed sources now calculates using the set base value.
Silence - Units affected by Silence sources cannot cast abilities. Does not affect items.
Mute - Units affected by Mute sources cannot cast item abilities. Does not affect spells.
Changes the selection box correspondingly to the Hex model.
Neither affects the unit's collision size nor bound radius.
Visually transforms the affected enemy unit into a Pig.

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
360 mana, 1.5 mana regeneration and 3% flat base magic resistance.
30 main attack damage to Intelligence heroes.
13.5 main attack damage to universal heroes.
